text: allahu ninnale niravadhi sandarbhnnalil sahayiccittunt. hunayn ‎yud'dhadinattilum. ann ninnalute ennapperuppam ninnale ‎durabhimanikalakki. ennal a sankhyadhikyam ninnalkkeaettum ‎nettamuntakkiyilla. bhumi valare visalamayirikke tanne at parre ‎itunniyatayi ninnalkkuiteanni. annane ninnal pintirinneatukayum ‎ceytu. ‎
